package.name: Structures_DataGrid_Renderer_Smarty
package.description: This is a Rendering driver for Structures_DataGrid using Smarty. It adds the necessary variables and functions to a Smarty instance, in order to build a full-featured DataGrid within a Smarty template.
package.notes: - Request #8233: added new variable 'currentSort' to the Smarty instance, which is an array with the column names and the directions used for sorting currently (in addition, $columnSet[col].name is now available, containing the column name) (thanks to Alex Kunin, alexkunin at gmail dot com) - Request #8341: it is now possible to access the Column attributes from a Smarty template (thanks to Michael Caplan, michael at apison dot com) - Bug #8530: fixed an error in the generation of the sorting links (thanks to Anton, hire at ukr dot net)
